nodes.text: Imperial Palaces were Monuments constructed by the Galactic Empire. ASP-7 labor droids built them for a cost of 3000 units each of carbon, nova crystals, and ore. They had a square base and one entrance was in the front of the Palace's tower. It also possessed two spheres, as well as a statue of Emperor Palpatine. One Imperial Palace was built on Cloud City in the gas giant Bespin in 3 ABY after the Empire took control of the city. Moff Hindane Darcc had his own palace on Kashyyyk, which was destroyed by a Wookiee army after the Battle of Endor.

Imperial Palaces are the Galactic Empire Monument buildings in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. One must be built during the Darth Vader campaign during the Cloud City Attack mission. Another one appears in the Chewbacca campaign, which must be destroyed. Building an Imperial Palace and defending it for a set period of time is a way to win skirmish missions. They may also be build during multiplayer in the game's 2002 expansion pack, Clone Campaigns.
Because of the Imperial Palace monument's design being reused for the Imperial Palace on Coruscant, the design of the Imperial Palace was significantly different compared to most depictions.
